screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .ant file in Adobe Animate 2023
screenshot.caption: ANT file open in Adobe Animate 2023

description: Animate is an application for digital artists that allows them to design animations for cartoons, games, banners, and the web. The software also allows you to create tutorials to share with other Animate users to walk them through steps to perform a function.
You can create an ANT file with the "Hands-on Tutorial Creator" in Animate. You can access this creator by selecting Window → Extensions → Hands-on Tutorial Creator .

images.caption: ANT file open in Adobe Animate 2023
